faqs.question: What is a virtual gym?
faqs.answer: A virtual gym offers fitness training and exercise classes online through live streams or on-demand videos, allowing you to work out from anywhere.

faqs.question: How do I sign up for classes?
faqs.answer: You can sign up for classes by visiting our website, selecting the desired class, and completing the registration process. You will receive a confirmation email with further instructions.

faqs.question: What equipment do I need?
faqs.answer: Basic equipment such as a yoga mat, resistance bands, and dumbbells is recommended. Specific classes may require additional equipment, which will be listed in the class description.

faqs.question: Are the classes live or pre-recorded?
faqs.answer: We offer both live and pre-recorded classes. Live classes provide real-time interaction with the instructor, while pre-recorded sessions allow you to work out at your own pace.
